Lesson 7c - Linkbots Complex blinking.

Objective

One Linkbot blinks three times then pauses two seconds while staying on. A second Linkbot then blinks twice, pauses one second, and goes out again. Repeat process four times.


                

                    #!/usr/bin/env python3


                    # Filename: Lesson07c.py

                    import linkbot

                    import time



                    robot1 = linkbot.Linkbot('') # ID for first Linkbot

                    robot2 = linkbot.Linkbot('') # ID for second Lnkbot


                

                for i in range (1, 5): # does the following block 4 times

                    for k in range (1, 4): # does the following block 3 times

                        robot1.setLedColor({{m.led1[0]}},
                {{m.led1[1]}},
                {{m.led1[2]}}) # changes LED on robot1 to red

                        robot2.setLedColor({{m.led2[0]}},
                {{m.led2[1]}},
                {{m.led2[2]}}) # turns LED on robot2 to off

                        time.sleep(.5) # waits half a second

                        robot1.setLedColor(0, 0, 0) # turns LED on robot1 off

                        robot2.setLedColor(0, 0, 0) # turns LED on robot2 off

                        time.sleep(.5) # waits half a second


                    robot1.setLedColor({{m.led3[0]}},
                {{m.led3[1]}},
                {{m.led3[2]}})

                    robot2.setLedColor({{m.led4[0]}},
                {{m.led4[1]}},
                {{m.led4[2]}})

                    time.sleep(2)

                    for k in range (1, 3): # does the following block 2 times

                        robot1.setLedColor({{m.led5[0]}},
                {{m.led5[1]}},
                {{m.led5[2]}}) # turns LED on robot1 off

                        robot2.setLedColor({{m.led6[0]}},
                {{m.led6[1]}},
                {{m.led6[2]}}) # turns LED on robot2 to red

                        time.sleep(.5) # waits half a second

                        robot1.setLedColor(0, 0, 0) # turns LED on robot1 off

                        robot2.setLedColor(0, 0, 0) # turns LED on robot2 off

                        time.sleep(.5) # waits half a second


                    time.sleep(1)


                robot1.setLedColor(0, 0, 255) #returns LED to blue

                robot2.setLedColor(0, 0 ,255) #returns LED to blue

Explore

Have the Linkbots switch roles.
